name: Banana Belt
description:
This is just a quick little arcade game. Only took me a couple weeks of on and off work. Hope u like it, tho it's not exactly "high art".

Assets Used:

- Prototype Base Provided by Max Myers https://mjm.itch.io/

- "Ethnocentric" Font Type by Typodermic Fonts: https://www.dafont.com/ethnocentric.font

- "Pixel Particle" pack by Moenen: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/pixel-particle-126004

- All other assets created by myself
